burlap.behavior.singleagent.learnbydemo.mlirl.support

Class DifferentiableRF

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.behavior.singleagent.learnbydemo.mlirl.support.DifferentiableRF
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RewardFunction
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiffVFRF, LinearDiffRFVInit, LinearStateActionDifferentiableRF, LinearStateDifferentiableRF

    public abstract class DifferentiableRF
extends java.lang.Object
implements RewardFunction
    An abstract class for defining differentiable reward functions.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan.

    • Method Detail

      • getGradient

        public abstract double[] getGradient(State s,
                   GroundedAction ga,
                   State sp)
        Returns the gradient of the reward function for the given state transition.
        Parameters:
        s - the source state
        ga - the action taken in the source state
        sp - the resulting state from the action
        Returns:
        the gradient of the reward function for the given transition.

      • setParameters

        public void setParameters(double[] parameters)

      • setParameter

        public void setParameter(int i,
                double p)
        Sets the value of a given parameter.
        Parameters:
        i - which parameter to set
        p - the value of the parameter

      • getParameterDimension

        public int getParameterDimension()
        Returns the parameter dimensionality
        Returns:
        the parameter dimensionality

      • getParameters

        public double[] getParameters()
        Returns the parameters of this reward function. The parameters are *not* copied, so changes made externally to them affect this reward function.
        Returns:
        the parameters of this reward function

      • randomizeParameters

        public void randomizeParameters(double lowerVal,
                       double upperVal,
                       java.util.Random rand)
        Randomizes the parameter values using the given random number generator.
        Parameters:
        lowerVal - the lower parameter range value
        upperVal - the upper parameter range value
        rand - the random number generator to use

      • copyHelper

        protected abstract DifferentiableRF copyHelper()
        A helper method for making a copy of this reward function. THe parameters and dimensionality do not have to be copied, because they will be copied in the public copy() method.
        Returns:
        a copy of this reward function.

      • copy

        public DifferentiableRF copy()
        Creates a copy of this reward function. The parameters of the copy can be modified without affecting the parameters this source reward function.
        Returns:
        a copy of this reward function

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
